hurry.qunit basic tests
=======================================

Here are some basic tests for hurry.qunit.

Let's set up a way to render URLs; typically the framework has already
done this::

  >>> class Plugin(object):
  ...   def get_library_url(self, library):
  ...     return 'http://localhost/static/%s' % (library.name)
  >>> from hurry.resource import register_plugin
  >>> register_plugin(Plugin())

Render the inclusion::

  >>> from hurry.resource import NeededInclusions
  >>> from hurry.qunit import qunit
  >>> needed = NeededInclusions()
  >>> needed.need(qunit)
  >>> print needed.render()
  <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://localhost/static/qunit_lib/qunit.css" />
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/static/qunit_lib/qunit.js"></script>

No minified at the moment

  >>> needed.mode('minified')
  >>> print needed.render()
  <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://localhost/static/qunit_lib/qunit.css" />
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/static/qunit_lib/qunit.js"></script>
